summary: Enhanced Textures for Statues. This is a work in progress.
descriptionHtml:
I was appalled by the quality of the textures of the Clavicus Vile Shrine, so I decided to give them a makeover. These are the vanilla textures, but they have been enhanced significantly. If you want true retextures, make them yourself, but this is all I wanted for the time being. I hope you can enjoy them, but if not, just delete them. 

Currently, it\'s a 4096x4096 texture, but if I get enough requests, I\'ll put up a 2048x2048 version. 

No framerate impact on my system.

Install:
Drop the texture folder into Skyrim\'s Data folder.

Uninstall:
Delete the statues folder from the Data/texture/clutter folder
author: UnitAlpha
